column5: WIFE DIDNT HAVE ANY CHORES FOR ME SO GOT TO SNEAK OUT IN THE AFT FOR A FEW HRS YESTERDAY. WATER WAS UP AND DIRTY BUT SLOWLY CLEARING. WAS GLAD TO SEE ONLY HALF THE GTA OUT TODAY ON MY LITTLE CREEK LOL CAUGHT A FEW SMALL ONES AND THIS NICE HEN. LOST ANOTHER MONSTER IN THE WOOD. WAS LIKE BASS FISHIN FOR STEEL. ALL FISH WERE HUGGIN THE WOOD. WAS NICE TO RUN INTO SILVIO AND SHARE A FEW STORIES. RIVERS BLOWN TODAY BUT THERES ALWAYS TOMOR  LOL
Gorgeous catch! I still can't wait to hook into my 1st - especially with my new Matrix by Raven setup!
ONCE U PIN YOU'LL NEVER SPIN AGAIN  LOL
Nice fish!! I'm eyeballing tomorrow morning. The benefits of working the afternoon shift.  Thanks for posting!

GONNA BE A TUFF CALL ON TOMOR. WAS THINKIN THE SAME BUT I LIVE UP FROM THE LAKE AND NEAR A FEW FEEDER CREEKS AND THERE PRETTY HIGH AND DIRTY. GONNA BE A TOUGH CALL IF THEY'LL BE DOWN BY TOMOR. HOPE FOR A REAL COLD NIGHT  LOL
Real beauty CC    congratulations I say that's a well spent few hours on the creek!!! Great job and thanks for sharing Leechman

CC wants a cold night?  I think he gets his wish in spades.  I saw two BIG SUVs into the QEW guardrail near Jameson tonight around 10 pm.  Water Resource Management folks at the MNR (me bruvvah) are hoping for cold temps too.
